name: Zodiacal Monsters
description: Omega is an powerful entity able to do anything to have revenge against God who is his brother, the counterpart of him, if now God with their new creation with help of the martians called "Zodiacal Monsters" can defeat Omega, maybe, the evil in our world and the universe ends forever, because Omega is the responsible of our personal problems like money, love, friendship, family and ourself.
